passive.name: Super Luck
passive.description: This Pokémon's critical-hit rate is increased by an additional 15%.

passive.name: Stance Change
passive.description: Switch entre Blade Forme (lame) et Shield Forme (bouclier). À chaque changement de stance : +15% vitesse de déplacement et +15% vitesse d'auto-attaque pendant 3.5s.

passive.name: Flash Fire
passive.description: Quand Armarouge subit des dégâts Sp. Atk, réduit les dégâts Sp. Atk reçus de 20% pendant 3s et la prochaine auto-attaque inflige des dégâts supplémentaires. Cooldown 10s après la fin.

passive.name: Torrent
passive.description: While at 50% max HP or below: increases Attack and Sp. Atk by 20%.

passive.name: Beast Boost
passive.description: Each time Buzzwole hits an enemy with basic attacks, Mega Punch, Lunge, or Smack Down - muscle gauge increases

damages.name: Shield
damages.notes: 20% max HP + 2% max HP x muscle gauge

passive.name: Weak Armor
passive.description: If the effect stacks 6 times on an enemy, that Pokémon takes 15% increased damage from Ceruledge.

damages.name: Healing
damages.notes: 50% of damage dealt (70% upgraded); excess becomes shield; half vs wild

passive.name: Infiltrator
passive.description: Chaque fois que Chandelure inflige des dégâts, gagne un stack (max 8). Chaque stack ignore 2.5% de la Sp. Def adverse (jusqu'à 20%). Dure 4s, rafraîchit à chaque stack.
